XXvinv07_u:169: tathā sthavirair api sūtrānte upanibaddhaṃ buddho bhagavān vaiśālyāṃ viharati gopasiṃhaśālavane iti /

XXvinv07_u:246: tato gopo rājānam avalokya ratham āruhya vaiśālīṃ saṃprasthitaḥ /

XXvinv07_u:284: paṃcaśatāni bhūmau nipatitāni prāṇaiś ca viyuktāni /

XXvinv07_u:343: aho batāhaṃ devasya pṛṣṭhamāṃsāny utpāṭyotpāṭya bhakṣayeyam iti /
XXvinv07_u:352: deva tūlikāyāṃ māṃsapūrṇāṃ prāvṛtiṃ devyā ātmānam upanaya iti /
XXvinv07_u:353: tato rājñā māṃsapūrṇayā tūlikayā ātmānaṃ veṣṭayitvā celāyā
XXvinv07_u:356: tatas tasyā yo dohadaḥ sa prativigataḥ /

XXvinv07_u:366: / deva yathā śāstre dṛśyate niyatam ayaṃ dārakaḥ pitaraṃ jīvitād
XXvinv07_u:367: vyaparopya svayam eva paṭṭaṃ baddhvā rājyaṃ kārayiṣyatīti /
XXvinv07_u:369: sarvathā rājyārtham ayaṃ māṃ jīvitād vyaparopayati /
XXvinv07_u:370: tad asmai svayam eva rājyaṃ dāsyāmi /

XXvinv07_u:385: śrutvā mahānāmo gṛhapatir bhūyasyā mātrayā vismayam āpannas tasmiṃś codyāne ārakṣakān puruṣān samantataḥ sthāpayitvā divasān gaṇayitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:386: yāvat saptame divase tasminn udyāne apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallaṃ vyavasthāpite candanavāripariṣikte surabhidhūpaghaṇṭikopanibaddhe āmuktapaṭṭadāmakalāpe puṣpāvakīrṇe anekagītavāditraninādite suhṛtsaṃbandhibāndhavajanaparivṛto mahatā śrīsamudayena antaḥpurasahito nirgatas tasya tasmiṃś codyāne krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kadalīstambhaḥ sphuṭitaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:394: yāvan mahānāmo gṛhapatir udyānāt svagṛhaṃ gata āmrapālī dārikā unnīyate caryate pūrvavad yāvan mahatī saṃvṛttā /

XXvinv07_u:405: śṛṇvantu bhavanto brāhmaṇā gṛhapatayo mamodyāne dārikā utpannā /
XXvinv07_u:407: tām ahaṃ svakulavaṃśapratirūpakasya kasyacid bhāryārtham anuprayacchāmi /
XXvinv07_u:410: gṛhapate gaṇena pūrvam eva kriyākāraḥ kṛtaḥ kanyā anirvāhā strīratnaṃ gaṇabhogyam iti /

XXvinv07_u:420: putri tvaṃ strīratnam iti kṛtvā gaṇabhogyā saṃvṛttā /

XXvinv07_u:424: tvaṃ ca strīratnam ato 'ham anīśvara iti /

XXvinv07_u:430: yaś ca praviśati sa paṃcakārṣāpaṇaśatāny (243v1 = GBM 6.799) ādāya /

XXvinv07_u:436: strīratnam asāv arhaty eva prathame skandhe gṛham* /
XXvinv07_u:437: yat kathayaty ekasmin praviṣṭe dvitīyena na praveṣṭavyam iti /
XXvinv07_u:440: yady ekasmin praviṣṭe dvitīyaḥ praviśati niyatam anyonyavipraghātiko bhaviṣyati /
XXvinv07_u:441: yat kathayati yaḥ praviśati tena paṃcakārṣāpaṇaśatāny ādāya praveṣṭavyam iti /
XXvinv07_u:444: yat kathayati saptame divase gṛhavicayaḥ kartavya ity etad api yuktam* /
XXvinv07_u:445: pūrvaṃ vā kriyeta paścād vā ko 'tra virodhaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:446: yat kathayati niṣkāsaḥ praveśo vā manuṣyāṇāṃ na vicāraṇīya ity etad api yuktam* /
XXvinv07_u:448: yadi puruṣāṇāṃ niṣkāsaḥ praveśo vā vicāryate kas tasyā gṛhaṃ pravekṣyati /
XXvinv07_u:449: tato gaṇena tasyāḥ paṃca varā dattāḥ /
XXvinv07_u:451: vaiśālakā licchavayas tasyā gṛhaṃ praveṣṭum ārabdhāḥ paricārayitum* /
XXvinv07_u:452: (MSV II 19) tatra keṣāṃcid uttaptaviṭatvāt sahadarśanād eva rāgo vigacchati /
XXvinv07_u:459: bhavanto yena yādṛśo rājā vā rājamātro vā dhanī vā śreṣṭhī vā vaṇig vā sārthavāho vā dṛṣṭaḥ sa tat tādṛśaṃ bhittau likhatv iti /
XXvinv07_u:461: tata āmrapālī nānālaṃkāravibhūṣitā citrakarma pratyavekṣate pṛcchati ca /
XXvinv07_u:470: evaṃ sarve tayā pṛṣṭās tair api sarvaiḥ samākhyātāḥ /
XXvinv07_u:471: tatas tasyā sarvān pratyavekṣya bimbisāre dṛṣṭir nipātitā /
XXvinv07_u:474: puruṣasyārohapariṇāhaḥ śakṣyaty eṣa mayā sārdhaṃ paricārayitum iti /
XXvinv07_u:475: yāvad apareṇa samayena rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāra upari prāsādatalagato
XXvinv07_u:480: vaiśālyām āmrapālī nāma veśyā atīva rūpayauvanasaṃpannā catuḥṣaṣṭikalābhijñā devasyaivopabhogyā
XXvinv07_u:482: gopaḥ yady evaṃ gacchāmo vaiśālīṃ tayā sārdhaṃ paricārayāmaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:484: devasya vaiśālakā licchavayo dīrgharātraṃ bādhakāḥ pratyarthinaḥ pratyamitrāḥ /
XXvinv07_u:492: sa ratham abhiruhya gopena sārdhaṃ vaiśālīṃ saṃprasthito
XXvinv07_u:510: saptāhaṃ tāvat krīḍa ramasva paricāraya saptāhasyātyayāt kālajñā bhaviṣyāmīti /
XXvinv07_u:511: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati yāvad āmrapālī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXvinv07_u:514: tena tasyā viralī aṅgulimudrā ca dattā /
XXvinv07_u:518: etāṃ viralīṃ prāvṛtya (MSV II 21) aṅgulimudrāṃ ca grīvāyāṃ
XXvinv07_u:520: sa nirgatya gopena sārdhaṃ ratham abhiruhya saṃprasthitaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:525: paṃca licchaviśatāni baddhagodhāṅgulitrāṇāni rājño bimbisārasya pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhāni /
XXvinv07_u:537: bhavantaḥ sa evāyaṃ puruṣarākṣaso nivartāmaha iti /
XXvinv07_u:538: te pratinivṛttā vaiśālīṃ gatāḥ saṃnipatya punaḥ kriyākāraṃ kṛtāḥ /
XXvinv07_u:539: bhavanta etad api vairam asmābhir bimbisāraputrāṇāṃ niryātayitavyam iti /
XXvinv07_u:540: yāvan navānāṃ māsānām atyayād āmrapālī prasūtā /
XXvinv07_u:542: abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko yāvad unnītaś carito mahān saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:543: sa vaiśālakair licchavidārakaiḥ sārdhaṃ krīḍaṃs tair apriyam uktaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:547: sa prarudan mātuḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntas tayocyate /
XXvinv07_u:551: putra yadi bhūyaḥ pṛcchanti vaktyavyās tādṛśo mama pitā yo yuṣmākam ekasyāpi nāstīti /
XXvinv07_u:555: yāvat sa tair sārdhaṃ bhūyaḥ krīḍitum ārabdhaḥ sa tais tathaivoktaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:557: tādṛśo me pitā yo yuṣmākam ekasyāpi nāstīti /
XXvinv07_u:568: saṃbahulāś ca vaṇijaḥ paṇyam ādāya rājagṛhaṃ saṃprasthitāḥ /
XXvinv07_u:569: tayā ta upalabdhā uktāś ca anenāṅgulimudreṇa bhāṇḍaṃ mudrayitvā gacchata /
XXvinv07_u:572: etad aṅgulimudrakaṃ grīvāyāṃ baddhā rājakuladvāre sthāpayiṣyatha /
XXvinv07_u:578: yadi kaścit kathayati nāyaṃ dārako bibhetīti /
XXvinv07_u:581: sa vaṇigbhiḥ sārdham anupūrveṇa rājagṛhaṃ gataḥ /
XXvinv07_u:588: tāta asti kaścit putraḥ pitur bibhetīti /
XXvinv07_u:590: abhayo rājakumāro 'bhayo rājakumāra iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā /
XXvinv07_u:599: bhadre gacchāmi paṇyam ādāya deśāntaram iti /
XXvinv07_u:603: rājā bimbisāro hastiskandhābhirūḍhas tasyā gṛhasamīpena gacchati /
XXvinv07_u:604: tayā ca vātāyanasthayā rājñaḥ sragdāmaṃ kṣiptam* /
XXvinv07_u:612: sā tasmin samaye kalyāṇī ṛtumatī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXvinv07_u:615: tato rājñā tasyāpi aṅgulimudrakañcitrā ca viralī dattā /
XXvinv07_u:618: etāṃ viralikāṃ prāvṛtya aṅgulimudrakaṃ ca grīvāyāṃ baddhvā mama preṣayiṣyasi /
XXvinv07_u:621: yāvad asau sārthavāhaḥ saṃpannārthe rājagṛhasamīpam āgataḥ /
XXvinv07_u:622: tena patnyādi saṃdiṣṭaṃ bhadre prāmodyam utpādaya /
XXvinv07_u:624: kiyat tamair divasair (MSV II 24) āgata eveti /
XXvinv07_u:627: GBM 6.802) rūpam akṛtyaṃ kṛtaṃ sa cāgataḥ /
XXvinv07_u:632: ahaṃ tathā kariṣye yathā na śīghram āgamiṣyatīti /
XXvinv07_u:636: tena vinā tvayā iha na praveṣṭavyam iti /
XXvinv07_u:637: sa teṣāṃ ratnānām arthāya dūrataraṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:642: tayā peḍāyāṃ prakṣipya ghṛtasya madhunaś cāpyaṃ pūrayitvā aṃgulimudrakaṃ grīvāyāṃ baddhvā viralikayā pracchādya preṣyadārikā abhihitā /
XXvinv07_u:643: gaccha tvam etāṃ peḍāṃ rājakuladvāraṃ nītvā maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā pradīpaṃ prajvālya ekānte tiṣṭha yāvat kenacid gṛhīta iti /
XXvinv07_u:644: tayā yathākṛtaṃ yāvad rājā upari prāsādatalagato abhayena rājakumāreṇa sārdhaṃ tiṣṭhati /
XXvinv07_u:647: paśyata bhavantaḥ kim eṣa rājakuladvāre pradīpo jvalatīti /
XXvinv07_u:652: deva yad atra peḍāyāṃ tan mama dātum arhasīti /
XXvinv07_u:658: 25) kim ayaṃ jīvaty āhosvin mṛta iti /
XXvinv07_u:660: tato rājñā aṃgulimudrakaṃ viralikāṃ ca pratyabhijñāya abhayāya sa rājakumārāya dattaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:662: rājñā jīvakavādena samudācarito 'bhayena ca rājakumāreṇa bhṛta iti jīvakaḥ kumārabhṛto
XXvinv07_u:664: yāvad apareṇa samayena jīvakaḥ kumārabhṛto mahān saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:667: vayam api kiṃcic chilpaṃ śikṣāmahe yad asmākam uttarakālaṃ jīvikā bhaviṣyatīti /
XXvinv07_u:669: rathakāraś ca śuklavāsāḥ śuklavāsobhiḥ puruṣaiḥ parivṛto rājakulaṃ praviśati /
XXvinv07_u:670: so 'bhayena rājakumāreṇa dṛṣṭas tenānye ca rājapuruṣāḥ pṛṣṭāḥ ka eṣa iti /
XXvinv07_u:678: deva aham api rathakāratvaṃ śikṣe iti /
XXvinv07_u:684: jīvakenāpi vaidyo dṛṣṭaḥ śuklavāsāḥ śuklavāsobhiḥ puruṣaiḥ parivṛto rājakulaṃ praviśan /
XXvinv07_u:685: tenāpare ca pṛṣṭāḥ ka eṣa iti /
XXvinv07_u:691: (MSV II 26) atha preto na mārgyo na pṛcchyaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:701: sa kapālīmocanīṃ tu vidyāṃ na jānāti /
XXvinv07_u:702: tena śrutaṃ takṣaśilāyām ātreyo nāma vaidyarājaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:715: eṣa mama putro vaidyakaṃ śikṣitum ātreyasya sakāśaṃ gacchaty asya sarvayogodvahanaṃ kartavyam iti /
XXvinv07_u:718: puṣkarasāriṇā ca lekhaṃ vācayitvā ātreyasya samarpitaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:719: eṣa rājaputras tvatsakāśam upetyāgato vaidyakam enaṃ śikṣayasveti /
XXvinv07_u:721: so 'lpataram upadiśati jīvakaḥ saviśeṣaṃ gṛhṇāty ācarati /
XXvinv07_u:722: ātreyasya yadā glānāvalokako gacchati tadā ekam ādāya gacchati /
XXvinv07_u:723: so 'pareṇa samayena jīvakam (MSV II 27) ādāya gataḥ /
XXvinv07_u:729: yady eṣa etad bhaiṣajyam upayuṃkte adyaiva kālaṃ karoti /
XXvinv07_u:733: sa ātreyeṇa sārdhaṃ niṣkramya punaḥ praviṣṭaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:736: yan mayā bhaiṣajyaṃ vyupadiṣṭaṃ tan na deyam idaṃ cedaṃ ca deyam iti /
XXvinv07_u:739: yāvad aparasmin divase punar apy ātreyasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ /
XXvinv07_u:742: evaṃ punar apy etad eva deyam* /
XXvinv07_u:743: tat kiṃ yat pūrvam ādiṣṭam* āhosvit paścāt* /
XXvinv07_u:744: kiṃ mayā pūrvam ādiṣṭaṃ kiṃ vā paścāt* /
XXvinv07_u:745: taiḥ samākhyātam idaṃ tvayā sākṣād vyupadiṣṭaṃ idaṃ jīvakena saṃdiṣṭam iti /
XXvinv07_u:747: ham* jīvakaḥ prājña iti viditvā kathayati yad jīvakena vyupadiṣṭaṃ tad dātavyam iti /
XXvinv07_u:749: sa yatra gacchati tatra jīvakam ādāya /
XXvinv07_u:750: te 'nye māṇavakāḥ kathayanty upādhyāya tvam asya rājaputra iti kṛtvā yatnato (246r1 = GBM 6.804) vyupadeśaṃ karoṣy asmākaṃ na karoṣīti /
XXvinv07_u:757: tena te māṇavakāḥ sarve vīthīṃ preṣitās tvayāmukasya dravyasya mūlyaṃ praṣṭavyaṃ tvayāmukasyeti
XXvinv07_u:763: yady upādhyāyo 'nyasya dravyasya mūlyaṃ prakṣyati kiṃ mayā vaktavyam* /
XXvinv07_u:765: te sarve upādhyāyasakāśam āgatya yathāsaṃdiṣṭaṃ niveditavantaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:767: māṇavaka amukasya dravyasya kiṃ mūlyam iti /
XXvinv07_u:777: ity artham ahaṃ kathayāmīti jīvakaḥ prājño 'ham alpaṃ vyapadiśāmy ayaṃ svaśaktyā vibhajatīti
XXvinv07_u:780: te tenoktā gacchata saralakaṃ parvatam abhaiṣajyam ānayateti /
XXvinv07_u:781: te gatās teṣāṃ yad yad abhaiṣajyam abhirucitaṃ tat tena
XXvinv07_u:786: yāvajjīvakenārdhapathe gopāṃganā dṛṣṭā dadhighaṭakiṭālapiṇḍaṃ cādāyātreyasakāśaṃ saṃprasthitātīvākṣirogārtā
XXvinv07_u:790: tena tasyās tasminn eva sthāne saṃnihitabhaiṣajyaṃ vyupadiṣṭam* /
XXvinv07_u:794: tena kiṭālapiṇḍako gṛhīto dadhighaṭas tu tayā eva dattaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:797: yāvat tair māṇavakair antarmārge hastipadaṃ dṛṣṭam* /
XXvinv07_u:812: māṇavakāḥ sarvam etad bhaiṣajyam etan tāvad udakenaivaṃ vidhināmukasya rogasya /
XXvinv07_u:816: sa kathayaty upādhyāya sarvam eva bhaiṣajyaṃ nāsti kiñcid abhaiṣajyam* /
XXvinv07_u:817: api tu mayā śaramūlam ānītaṃ pāṣāṇavartikā kiṭālapiṇḍaś ceti /
XXvinv07_u:824: te kathayanty upādhyāya kim etad eva /
XXvinv07_u:839: katham etad* jñāyate hastipadaṃ hastinyāḥ padam iti /
XXvinv07_u:840: sa kathayaty upādhyāya vayaṃ rājakule saṃvṛddhāḥ (246v1 = GBM 6.805) kathaṃ na jānīmaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:859: api tu yady upādhyāyasya vimarṣaḥ sa sārtho 'muṣmin pradeśe tatra kañcin
XXvinv07_u:868: jīvakena sarvaṃ śikṣitaṃ sthāpayitvā kapālamocanīṃ vidyām* /
XXvinv07_u:869: yāvad anyatamaḥ puruṣaḥ kapālavyādhinā spṛṣṭa ātreyasakāśaṃ gataḥ kathayaty ātreya mama cikitsāṃ kuru /
XXvinv07_u:871: bhoḥ puruṣa adya tāvad gartāṃ khānaya gomayaṃ ca samupānaya /
XXvinv07_u:876: bhoḥ (MSV II 31) puruṣa yat kiṃcid ahaṃ śikṣe sarvaṃ tat satvahitahetoḥ /
XXvinv07_u:878: / sa tvaṃ samprati gupte sthāpaya yathā tava karma kriyamāṇaṃ paśyāmīti /
XXvinv07_u:882: tata ātreyeṇāgatya sa puruṣo gartāyāṃ nikhātaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:884: sa taṃ prāṇakaṃ saṃdaṃśena grahītum ārabdhaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:885: jīvakaḥ kathayaty upādhyāya mā sāhasaṃ kariṣyasi /
XXvinv07_u:899: jīvaka parituṣṭo 'haṃ snātvāgaccha kapālamocanīṃ vidyāṃ dāsyāmīti /
XXvinv07_u:903: jīvakāsmākaṃ jīvikaiṣā na tvayeha viṣaye prayoktavyā /
XXvinv07_u:905: jīvaka ātreyam upāmaṃtrya puṣkarasāriṇo rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatvopāmaṃtrayati /
XXvinv07_u:908: tena khalu samayena puṣkarasāriṇo rājñaḥ pāṇḍavā nāma khaṣā viruddhāḥ /
XXvinv07_u:910: jīvaka mama pāṇḍavā nāma khaṣā viruddhāṃs tāvat saṃnāmaya paścād yāsyasi /
XXvinv07_u:914: tatas tena caturaṃgaṃ balakāyaṃ datvā preṣitaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:918: tena parituṣṭena tasyaivānumoditam* tenāpi ātreyāya dattam* /
XXvinv07_u:921: tatra tena sarvabhūtarutaṃ nāma śāstraṃ śikṣitam* /
XXvinv07_u:924: anyatamaś ca puruṣaḥ kāṣṭhabhāram ādāya nagaraṃ praviśaty asthicarmāvaśeṣaḥ samantād gātreṇādharataḥ
XXvinv07_u:926: bhoḥ puruṣa kena te īdṛśī samavasthā iti /
XXvinv07_u:927: sa kathayaty aham api na jāne /
XXvinv07_u:928: api tu mayā caiṣa cāṣṭhabhārako gṛhīto bhavati /
XXvinv07_u:932: bhoḥ puruṣa kim ayaṃ kāṣṭhabhārako vikrīyate /
XXvinv07_u:937: tataḥ pratyavekṣatā sarvabhūtaprasādano nāma maṇir dṛṣṭaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:938: tasyedṛśaḥ prabhāvo yadā vyādhitasya purastāt sthāpyate tadā vyādhir yathābhūtā ca dṛśyate pradīpeṇeva gṛhagataṃ dravyam* /
XXvinv07_u:941: / sa droṇaṃ māpayitvāḍhakena śirasi prahāraṃ dadāti /
XXvinv07_u:942: jīvakena dṛṣṭaḥ uktaś ca bhoḥ puruṣa kimartham eva karoṣi /
XXvinv07_u:946: tato jīvakena sarvabhūtaprasādako maṇis tasya śirasi sthāpito yāvat paśyati śatapadīm* /
XXvinv07_u:948: bhoḥ puruṣa tava śirasi śatapadī tiṣṭhatīti /
XXvinv07_u:949: sa pādayor nipatya kathayati cikitsāṃ me kuruṣveti /
XXvinv07_u:954: bhoḥ puruṣādya gartaṃ khānaya pāṣiṃ ca samupānaya cikitsāṃ kariṣyāmīti /
XXvinv07_u:956: jīvakenāpy aparasmin divase sa puruṣo garte nikhāte nikhātya kapālamocanyā vidyayā kapālaṃ mocayitvā saptena saṃdaṃśena śatapadī spṛṣṭā /
XXvinv07_u:964: sa tatrātivādhyavasitaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā tasminn evāmanuṣyakeṣūpapannaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:966: tena tasminn udyāne ārakṣakaḥ puruṣaḥ sthāpitaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:972: yāvad anyatara udarī manuṣyaḥ sarvavaidyapratyākhyātas tad udyānaṃ gatvā rātriṃ vāsam upagataḥ
XXvinv07_u:974: tasminn eva ca jīvako rātriṃ vāsam upagataḥ /
XXvinv07_u:975: yāvad asāv amanuṣyakas tam udariṇam abhidravitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:979: nāsti te kaścit* chāgasaṭāyā dhūpaṃ dātā yena tvaṃ dvādaśa yojanāni niṣpalāyer iti /
XXvinv07_u:981: tavāpi nāsti kaścin mūlakabījam udaśvinā piṣṭā dātā yena tvaṃ khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ viśīryethā iti
XXvinv07_u:983: sa kalyam evotthāya tasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ /
XXvinv07_u:984: kathayati gṛhapate udyānaṃ puṣpaphalasalilasaṃpannaṃ kimartham utsṛṣṭam iti /
XXvinv07_u:991: tenāpi gṛhapatinā paṃca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni jīvakāya dattāni /
XXvinv07_u:994: bhoḥ puruṣa kimarthaṃ tvam atrāmanuṣyakādhyuṣite udyāne tiṣṭhasīti /
XXvinv07_u:1001: tenāpi puruṣeṇa paṃca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni jīvakāya dattāni /
XXvinv07_u:1008: tasmiṃś ca vṛkṣe vṛdhriṇī sapotakā tiṣṭhati /
XXvinv07_u:1014: amba eṣa mallo mallena nihataḥ kālagato nīyate /
XXvinv07_u:1016: sthānam etad vidyate yad enaṃ svasthīkariṣyati /
XXvinv07_u:1021: utthāya mṛtasakāśaṃ gatvā pṛcchati bhavantaḥ kim etad iti /
XXvinv07_u:1029: tato jīvakena ca sarvabhūtaprasādakamaṇiḥ śirasi sthāpayitvā pratyavekṣitaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:1031: tena nāḍikāyāṃ cūrṇaṃ prakṣipya mukhe vāyunā preritam* /
XXvinv07_u:1040: sā yena sārdhaṃ paricārayati sa kālaṃ karoti /
XXvinv07_u:1041: tatas tayā sārdhaṃ na kaścit paricārayati /
XXvinv07_u:1042: tayā śrutaṃ jīvako vaidya ihāgataḥ iti /
XXvinv07_u:1046: jīvakas tāṃ dṛṣṭvā kathālāpaṃ ca śrutvā saṃraktaḥ kathayati /

XXvinv07_u:1371: iha bhiṣak chalyāhartābādhaṃ jānāty ayam ābādho vātasamuttho vā vipattisamuttho vā śleṣmasamuttho vātmopakramiko vā paropakramiko vā sāṃnipātiko vā ṛtupariṇāmiko vety evam ābādhasamutthānakuśalo bhavati /
XXvinv07_u:1373: iha bhiṣak chalyāhartābādhaṃ jānāty ayam ābādho 'ṃjanena vā pratyaṃjanena vā vāmanena vā virecanena vordhvavirecanena vādhovirecanena vā nastakarmaṇā vā dhūpadānena vā svedaparikarmaṇā vā prahāsyatīty evam utpannasyābādhasya prahāṇakuśalo bhavati /

XXvinv07_u:1572: tasya viśākhā nāma duhitā rūpayauvanavatī nayavinayasaṃpannā paṇḍitā paṭupracārā /

XXvinv07_u:2526: eṣo 'pi bhikṣus trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt srotaāpanno bhavaty avinipātadharmo niyataṃ saṃbodhiparāyaṇaḥ saptakṛtvo bhavaparamāḥ
XXvinv07_u:2527: saptakṛtvo devāṃś ca manuṣyāṃś ca saṃdhāyya saṃsṛtya duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyatīti /
XXvinv07_u:2528: sa kadācit śrāvastīm āgamiṣyati punaś ca gamiṣyati /
XXvinv07_u:2529: sa madīyam āgantukabhaktaṃ pūrvavad yāvad varṣāśāṭīcīvaraṃ paribhokṣyati /
XXvinv07_u:2531: śrutvā ca punar adhigamiṣyāmi prītiprāmodyam udāraṃ kuśalaṃ naiṣkramyopasaṃhitam* /
XXvinv07_u:2534: eṣa bhikṣus trayāṇāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād rāgadveṣamohānāṃ ca tanutvāt sakṛdāgāmī bhaviṣyati
XXvinv07_u:2535: sakṛd imaṃ lokam āgatya duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyatīti /
XXvinv07_u:2540: śrutvā ca punar adhigamiṣyāmi prītiprāmodyam udāraṃ kuśalaṃ naiṣkramyopasaṃhitam* /
XXvinv07_u:2542: eṣa bhikṣuḥ paṃcānām avarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād anāgāmī /
XXvinv07_u:2543: bhaviṣyaty anāgantā punar imaṃ lokam iti /
XXvinv07_u:2544: so 'pi kadācit* śrāvastīm āgamiṣyati punaś ca gamiṣyati /
XXvinv07_u:2545: sa madīyam āgantukabhaktaṃ pūrvavad yāvad varṣāśāṭīcīvaraṃ bhikṣuṇī codakaśāṭikām iti
XXvinv07_u:2546: / śrutvā ca punar adhigamiṣyāmi prītiprāmodyam udāraṃ kuśalaṃ
XXvinv07_u:2549: eṣa bhikṣuḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau pravekṣyatīti
XXvinv07_u:2550: so 'pi kadācit* śrāvastīm āgamiṣyati punaś ca gamiṣyati /
XXvinv07_u:2551: sa madīyam āgantukabhaktaṃ pūrvavad yāvad varṣāśāṭīcīvaraṃ bhikṣuṇī codakaśāṭikām iti /
XXvinv07_u:2552: śrutvā ca punar adhigamiṣyāmi prītiprāmodyam udāraṃ kuśalaṃ naiṣkramyopasaṃhitam* /
XXvinv07_u:2553: atha bhagavān viśākhāṃ mṛgāramātaraṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:2558: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* (MSV II
XXvinv07_u:2559: 88) tena khalu samayena saṃbahulā bhikṣava ārāmadvāre aśucimrakṣitāni śayanāsanāni śocayanty ātāpayanti praviṣajanti /
XXvinv07_u:2560: adrākṣīd bhagavān saṃbahulān bhikṣūn ārāmadvāre aśucimrakṣitāni śayanāsanāni śocayata ātapayataḥ praviṣajataḥ /
XXvinv07_u:2562: yad api śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ prapīḍya prapīḍya tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitaṃ dānāni dadati puṇyāni kurvanti tad api bhikṣavo mātrayā pratisaṃkhyāya paribhuṃjanta iti viditvā vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśāmayya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṃ prāvikṣat pratisaṃlayanāya /
XXvinv07_u:2563: atha bhagavān sāyāhne pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:2564: (260r1 = GBM 6.832) niṣadya bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma /
XXvinv07_u:2565: ihāhaṃ bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣam* /
XXvinv07_u:2566: adrākṣam ahaṃ bhikṣavaḥ saṃbahulān bhikṣūn ārāmadvāre aśucimrakṣitāni śayanāsanāni śocayata ātapayataḥ praviṣajataḥ /
XXvinv07_u:2567: dṛṣṭvā ca punar me etad abhavat* /
XXvinv07_u:2568: yad api śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ prapīḍya prapīḍya tvaṅmāṃsaśoṇitaṃ dānāni dadati puṇyāni kurvanti tad api bhikṣavo mātrayā pratisaṃkhyāya paribhuṃjante /
XXvinv07_u:2569: sādhu bhikṣavaḥ śraddhādeyasya mātrāparibhojitāyāḥ kālaparibhojitāyā vīciparibhojitāyāḥ saṃkhyāparibhojitāyā mitaparibhojitāyāḥ /
XXvinv07_u:2570: (MSV II 89) atha bhagavāñ chraddhādeyasya mātrādiparibhojitānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣitvā bhikṣūn
XXvinv07_u:2572: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo na vinā pratyāstaraṇena sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ paribhoktavyam aśucimrakṣitaṃ śayanāsanaṃ ca /
XXvinv07_u:2574: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣad āyuṣmatānandena paścācchramaṇena /
XXvinv07_u:2576: dūrād eva dṛṣṭvā ca punar āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate /
XXvinv07_u:2577: paśyasi tvam ānanda etaṃ puruṣaṃ kālakapṛṣṭham* /
XXvinv07_u:2579: eṣa ānanda puruṣaḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane pravrajita āsīt* /
XXvinv07_u:2580: tatrānena sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ kalpapratyāstaraṇena malapratyāstaraṇena paṭṭikāṃ surucikāṃ loḍhakaṃ kṛtvā paribhuktam* /
XXvinv07_u:2581: tasya karmaṇo vipākena paṃca janmaśatāni kālakaprṣṭho jātaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:2582: yāvad etarhy api kālakapṛṣṭho jāta iti /
XXvinv07_u:2583: viditvā vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā pūrvavad yāvat pratisaṃlayanād vyūtthāya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:2585: adyāhaṃ bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya (MSV II 90) praviṣṭaḥ
XXvinv07_u:2587: sa kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane bhikṣur āsīt* /
XXvinv07_u:2588: tatrānena sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ kalpapratyāstaraṇena pūrvavad yāvat paṃca janmaśatāni kālakapṛṣṭho jātaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:2589: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo 'dyāgreṇa na bhikṣuṇā kalpapratyāstaraṇena sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ paribhoktavyam* /
XXvinv07_u:2592: api tu dvābhyāṃ pratyāstaraṇābhyāṃ paribhoktavyaṃ ghanena vā ekapuṭena /
XXvinv07_u:2597: nīlaṃ kardamaṃ kaṣāyaṃ vā pratyāstaraṇaṃ śastralūnaṃ kṛtvā dhārayitavyam*
XXvinv07_u:2611: / prāsādeṣu puṣkariṇyāṃ dvārakoṣṭhake pariṣaṇḍāyāṃ caṃkrameṣu saṃsthānavṛkṣeṣu tiṣṭhanti
XXvinv07_u:2616: kuṣṭharogābhibhūtasyāhaṃ bhikṣavo bhikṣor āsamudācārikān dharmān prajñāpayiṣyāmi /
XXvinv07_u:2617: kuṣṭharogābhibhūtena bhikṣuṇā sāṃghikam śayanāsanaṃ layanaṃ ca na paribhoktavyam* /
XXvinv07_u:2620: sāmghikī prasrāvakuṭī varcaḥkuṭī ca na praveṣṭavyā /
XXvinv07_u:2621: pratigupte sthāne saṃghena tasya vāso deyaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:2623: kuṣṭharogābhibhūto bhikṣur yathāprajñaptān āsamudācārikān dharmān na samādāya vartate saṃgho vā sātisāro bhavati /
XXvinv07_u:2627: labhyaṃ bhadanta kauśeyaṃ cīvaraṃ tricīvarādhiṣṭhānena atirekacīvarādhiṣṭhānena dhārayitum*
XXvinv07_u:2635: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte (MSV II 92) asthāt*
XXvinv07_u:2636: / ekāntasthitaḥ sa bhikṣur bhagavantam idam avocat* /
XXvinv07_u:2637: icchāmy ahaṃ bhadanta bhāṅgeyaṃ cīvaraṃ dhārayitum* /
XXvinv07_u:2639: tīrthikadhvaja eṣa mohapuruṣaḥ yaduta bhāṅgeyaṃ cīvaram* /
XXvinv07_u:2640: tasmān na bhikṣuṇā bhāṅgeyaṃ cīvaraṃ dhārayitavyam* /
XXvinv07_u:2642: aparo bhikṣur gatvā bhagavantam idam avocat* /

XXvinv07_u:2656: atha sa (261r1 = GBM 6.834) bhikṣur nāgnyam alabhamānaḥ śikṣāṃ pratyākhyāya hānāyāvṛttaḥ
XXvinv07_u:2657: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ /
XXvinv07_u:2658: paśya bhadantāsau bhikṣur nāgnyam alabhamānaḥ śikṣāṃ pratyākhyāya hānāyāvṛttam* /
XXvinv07_u:2660: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'py adhvani ahrīkyadoṣād dārikāṃ na labdhavāṃs tac chrūyatām*
XXvinv07_u:2661: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo dhṛtarāṣṭro nāma haṃsarājo babhūva /
XXvinv07_u:2680: sa śrutvā mayūro dhṛtarāṣṭrasakāśaṃ gatvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate /
XXvinv07_u:2681: svaro manojño rucitaraś ca varṇo vyāmapramāṇāni ca varhakāṇi /
XXvinv07_u:2682: grīvā ca vaidūryamaṇeḥ samānā dadāsi kasmān na bhavān sutāṃ me //
XXvinv07_u:2684: svaro manojño rucitaraś ca varṇo vyāmapramāṇāni ca varhakāṇi /
XXvinv07_u:2685: grīvā ca vaidūryamaṇeḥ samānāhrīkyadoṣāt tu na te dadāmi // iti //
XXvinv07_u:2687: yo 'sau mayūraḥ eṣa evāsau bhikṣus tena kālena
XXvinv07_u:2689: tadāpy eṣa ahrīkyadoṣād dārikām alabhamāno duḥkhī durmanā pakṣiṇamadhyād avakrāntaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:2690: etarhy apy asau nāgnyam albhamāno duḥkhī durmanā bhikṣusaṃghamadhyāt prakrāntaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:2698: tasmān na hi bhikṣuṇā keśā luṃcitavyāḥ /

XXvinv07_u:2737: / tasmān na bhikṣuṇā sarvanīlaṃ cīvaraṃ dhārayitavyam* /
XXvinv07_u:2739: evaṃ sarvapītaṃ sarvalohitam avadātaṃ na kalpayaty eva
XXvinv07_u:2744: icchāmy ahaṃ bhadanta dīrghadaśaṃ cīvaraṃ dhārayitum* /
XXvinv07_u:2748: icchāmy ahaṃ bhadanta channadaśaṃ {MS phaṇadaśaṃ} cīvaraṃ dhārayitum* /

XXvinv07_u:2768: āgārikadhvaja eṣa pūrvavad yāvat sātisāro bhavati /
XXvinv07_u:2772: āgārikadhvaja eṣa pūrvavad yāvat sātisāro bhavati /
XXvinv07_u:2773: āyuṣmān plīhakānandaḥ anyatamasminn abhikṣuke āvāse akavāṭake varṣā upagataḥ /
XXvinv07_u:2776: na bhikṣuṇā abhikṣuke āvāse akavāṭake varṣā upagantavyam* /
XXvinv07_u:2777: na ca vinā saṃghāṭyā kvacid gantavyam* /
XXvinv07_u:2795: kulopakāś ca kaukṛtyaṃ saṃghalābhena tasya tat* //
XXvinv07_u:2796: uktaṃ bhagavatā bhikṣūṇāṃ cīvarapāto deya iti /
XXvinv07_u:2797: bhikṣavaḥ saṃghapravārita eva janapade cārikāṃ prakrāmanti /
XXvinv07_u:2800: bhikṣum avalokayitvā gantavyaṃ yo 'sya lābhaṃ gṛhṇāti /
XXvinv07_u:2807: apare 'pi bhikṣavaḥ avalokitā api pratijñāya na gṛhṇanti /
XXvinv07_u:2810: śramaṇerāṇāṃ prakrāntānāṃ na kaścil lābhaṃ gṛhṇāti /
XXvinv07_u:2824: aparaṃ naiva śakyate bhājayitum alpaṃ kṛtvā /
XXvinv07_u:2832: tatra yadi bhikṣuśataṃ prativasati paṭakaśataṃ dadāti /
XXvinv07_u:2833: evaṃ yāvad eko 'pi bhikṣuḥ prativasati paṭakaśatam eva dadāti /
XXvinv07_u:2834: yāvad apareṇa samayena tasminn eva vihāre dvau mahallau varṣoṣitau /
XXvinv07_u:2837: ekaḥ kathayati saṃghasyāyaṃ lābhaḥ pratipadyata iti /
XXvinv07_u:2856: na śakyam evam* (MSV II 99) yo navakaḥ sa gacchatu yo vṛddhaḥ sa vastrāṇi gopāyatu /
XXvinv07_u:2862: tenāsau dūrata eva dṛṣṭo bakākāraśirāḥ pralambabhrūḥ /
XXvinv07_u:2882: yady evam aham eva yuṣmākam anukampārthaṃ gacchāmi /
XXvinv07_u:2885: yady ayaṃ matsakāśād anyatra gamiṣyati mahājanapratisaṃviditaṃ kariṣyati /
XXvinv07_u:2895: tataḥ sa rātram evotthāya sālohitam ādāya tvaritatvaritaṃ (MSV II 100) saṃprasthitaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:2897: tatas tena dvitīyena sālohitena vihārasthena svāgatavādasamudācāreṇa samudācarya viśrāmitaḥ
XXvinv07_u:2898: atha trayo 'pi janā ekasmin sthāne niṣaṇṇāḥ /
XXvinv07_u:2916: tatas tayor dhruvapracāraṃ kalpakāraṃ pṛṣṭvā ekasya sakāśam upasaṃkramya pṛcchati /
XXvinv07_u:2918: / sthavira nityaṃ mayā vihāraḥ siktaḥ saṃmṛṣṭaḥ sukumārī gomayakārṣī datteti /
XXvinv07_u:2919: sālohita yadi secanena saṃmārjanena vā lābho labhyeta upanandaḥ sarvavihārān siñcet saṃmārjayec ca /
XXvinv07_u:2920: api tu yo 'tra lābhaḥ saṃpannaḥ sa
XXvinv07_u:2926: yam asau dadāti saḥ grahītavyo no tu vicārayitavyaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:2927: sa tenābhyāhata iti pratibhinnas (MSV II 101) tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:2931: sālohita yadi dharmaśravaṇena lābho labhyeta upanandas tiṣṭhan gacchan niṣaṇṇo niṣaṇṇaḥ sarvakālaṃ dharmaṃ deśayet* /
XXvinv07_u:2932: yaḥ kaścid ayaṃ lābhaḥ saṃpannaḥ sarvo 'sau
XXvinv07_u:2934: tenāyaṃ vihāro nityakālaṃ siktaḥ saṃmṛṣṭaḥ sukumārī gomayakārṣī tu pradattā /
XXvinv07_u:2941: kāyasya bhedāt sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyata iti /
XXvinv07_u:2946: yam asau dadāti sa grahītavyo no tu vicārayitavya iti /
XXvinv07_u:2956: tayor dvayor madhye ekaṃ bhāgaṃ sthāpayitvā jñaptiṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:2961: tat trayam (MSV II 102) ity eṣā jñaptiḥ /
XXvinv07_u:2962: tato dvau bhāgāv ātmanā gṛhītvā tayor eko dattaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:2963: tau kathayataḥ sthavira sa evāsmākaṃ kaliḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:2967: tam apy ādāya paṭakānāṃ bhāraṃ baddhvā saṃprasthitaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:2977: yaḥ kaścid ādīnavo bhikṣavaḥ parakīye lābhe sannipatanti /
XXvinv07_u:2978: tasmān na bhikṣuṇā parakīye lābhe sannipatitavyam* /
XXvinv07_u:2981: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati /
XXvinv07_u:2982: paśya bhadanta āyuṣmatā upanandena (263v1 = GBM 6.839) tan mahalladvayaṃ dharmamukhikayā
XXvinv07_u:2985: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'py adhvany anena mahalladvayaṃ vyaṃsitam* /
XXvinv07_u:2988: tad yadā jalena gacchati tadā matsyāḥ sthalam abhiruhanti /
XXvinv07_u:2990: tu sthalena gacchati tadā matsyā jale nipatanti /
XXvinv07_u:2994: yat saṃpadyate tad asmāt sāmānyam iti /
XXvinv07_u:2996: tatra ye jalasthena matsyāḥ saṃtrāsitāḥ sthalam abhirohanti /
XXvinv07_u:2997: tān sthalasthā praghātayati jalasthāñ jalastha eva /
XXvinv07_u:3006: yady apy evaṃ mamāpy eva eṣa doṣaḥ
XXvinv07_u:3008: yāvat pūrṇamukho nāma śṛgālas tayoḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:3019: tatas tayor dhruvapracāra kalpakāraṃ dṛṣṭvā ekasya sakāśam upasaṃkramya pṛcchati /
XXvinv07_u:3022: ye mayā jalena gacchatā matsyāḥ saṃtrāsitāḥ sthalam abhirūḍhāḥ te anena praghātitāḥ /
XXvinv07_u:3023: bhāgineya yadi jalagamanena kiñcit saṃpadyeta pūrṇamukho nityaṃ jalena yāyāt* /
XXvinv07_u:3024: tasya jalena gacchatā sthāṇubhayaṃ kaṇṭabhayaṃ (MSV II 104) śvāpadabhayaṃ kūlapātabhayam*
XXvinv07_u:3025: api tu yady asau na pratighātayati kiṃ tvaṃ trāsayitvā karoṣi /
XXvinv07_u:3026: sarvathā ye 'tra matsyāḥ saṃpannās te tasyānubhāvān na tava /
XXvinv07_u:3027: yad asau dadāti na grahītavyo no tu vicārayitavyaḥ /

XXvinv07_u:4030: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXvinv07_u:4031: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā babhūva /
XXvinv07_u:4035: tayor api kanīyān sa paurohityaṃ prārthayate /
XXvinv07_u:4036: dhātuśaḥ satvāḥ saṃsyandanta iti tayoḥ parasparaṃ sakhyam utpannam* /
XXvinv07_u:4038: ka upāyaḥ syād yenāhaṃ rājā bhaveyam* /
XXvinv07_u:4041: yadi tvaṃ māṃ paurohitye sthāpayasi (MSV II 138) kathayāmīti /
XXvinv07_u:4050: tatas tena tasya jyeṣṭhasya rājaputrasya bhaiṣajyaṃ dattam* /
XXvinv07_u:4053: amātyaiḥ sa vyaṃga iti kṛtvā kanīyān rājye 'bhiṣiktaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:4054: tenāpy asau kanīyān purohitaputraḥ paurohitye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:4055: yāvad apareṇa samayena rājā purohitena sārdhaṃ saṃlāpena tiṣṭhati /
XXvinv07_u:4058: na śobhanaṃ mayā kṛtaṃ yad rājyahetor bhrātā vyaṃgīkṛta iti /
XXvinv07_u:4061: yadi devasyābhimataṃ punar apy evaṃ yathāpaurāṇaṃ karomīti /
XXvinv07_u:4066: tatas tau pratyekabuddhe kārān kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhau /
XXvinv07_u:4067: yadāvābhyām evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kārāḥ kṛtā asya karmaṇo vipākena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyahi /
XXvinv07_u:4068: asya ca pāpasya vyaṃgīkaraṇasya karmaṇo vipākam anubhaveyam iti (273v1 = GBM 6.859) /
XXvinv07_u:4070: yo 'sau rājaputraḥ aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena /
XXvinv07_u:4073: yat tābhyāṃ saṃjalpaṃ kṛtvā rājakumārasya bhaiṣajyaṃ dattaṃ tena yugapad vyaṃgau saṃvṛttau
XXvinv07_u:4074: yat tu vipratisārābhyāṃ vicārya punar bhaiṣajyaṃ dattaṃ tena yugapat svasthībhūtau /
XXvinv07_u:4075: iti hi (MSV II 139) bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām
XXvinv07_u:4079: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasvābhogāḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:4082: tena khalu samayena śrāvastyāṃ śreṣṭhināmā gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhane mahābhoge vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXvinv07_u:4085: 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate /
XXvinv07_u:4086: tadyathā ārāmadevatā vanadevatāś catvaradevatāḥ śṛṃgāṭakadevatā balipratigrāhikā devatāḥ sahajāḥ sahadharmikā nityānubaddhā api devatā āyācate /
XXvinv07_u:4090: yady evam abhaviṣyad ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakaravartinaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:4091: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXvinv07_u:4097: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXvinv07_u:4098: yadāsya devatārādhanenāpi na putro na duhitā tadā sarvadevatāḥ pratyākhyāya bhagavaty abhiprasannaḥ
XXvinv07_u:4100: ārya icchāmi (MSV II 140) svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitum* /
XXvinv07_u:4102: sa tasyānupūrvyā keśāvataraṇaṃ kṛtvā śikṣāpadāni grāhayitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:4107: na tāvac chikṣāpadāni deyāni yāvat svasthaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:4109: tasyopasthānaṃ kartavyam iti hi bhikṣavo na jānante kena kartavyam iti /
XXvinv07_u:4116: ārya vayam asya divā cikitsikāṃ kurmaḥ rātrau glānyaṃ vardhate /
XXvinv07_u:4117: yady eṣa gṛhaṃ nīyate vayam asya rātrau cikitsāṃ kuryāma iti /
XXvinv07_u:4123: tasya muṇḍo gṛhapatir iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā /
XXvinv07_u:4124: sa yadā mūlagaṇḍapatrapuṣpaphalabhaiṣajyair upasthīyamāno na svasthībhavati tadā tenātmā paricchinno mṛto 'ham iti /
XXvinv07_u:4125: tatas tena maraṇakālasamaye sarvaṃ santakasvāpateyaṃ patrābhilekhyaṃ kṛtvā jetavane preṣitam*
XXvinv07_u:4129: prabhūtaṃ cāsya hiraṇyasuvarṇam asti hastino 'śvā gāvo mahiṣyaḥ sannāhāni ca /
XXvinv07_u:4130: etac ca sarvaṃ patrābhilikhitaṃ kṛtvā jetanavanam āryasaṃghāya preṣitam* /
XXvinv07_u:4132: āryopanandasantakam eva mayā apatrābhilikhitaṃ (MSV II 141) na pratilabdhaṃ prāg eva patrābhilikhitaṃ pratilapsye /
XXvinv07_u:4133: api tu yad bhagavān anujñāsyati tad grahīṣye /
XXvinv07_u:4140: dvipadā catuṣpadā yāvat* annapānaṃ ca bhaiṣajyam* /
XXvinv07_u:4141: dāso vā prastaraṃ lekhyaṃ yathāyogena bhājayet* //
XXvinv07_u:4142: hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca yac cāpy anyat kṛtākṛtam* /
XXvinv07_u:4143: samagraḥ saṃgho bhājayed iti proktaṃ maharṣiṇā //
XXvinv07_u:4152: śāṭakāḥ paṭakā carmabhāṇḍam upānahas tailakutupāḥ kuṇḍikākarakāś (MSV II 142) ca samagreṇa saṃghena bhājayitavyāḥ /
XXvinv07_u:4153: yaṣṭayo yā āyatās tā jambūcchāyikāḥ pratimāyā dhvajavaṃśāḥ kārayitavyāḥ /
XXvinv07_u:4154: yāḥ svalpās tāḥ khaṃkharakāḥ kṛtvā bhikṣūṇāṃ dātavyāḥ /
XXvinv07_u:4155: putradārakaṃ saṃghena yathāsukham avikrīya yathābhiprasādalabdhena moktavyāḥ /
XXvinv07_u:4156: catuṣpadānāṃ hastino 'śvā uṣṭrāḥ kharā vesarāś ca rājña upayogāḥ /
XXvinv07_u:4157: mahiṣyaḥ ajā eḍakāś cāturdiśāya bhikṣusaṃghāya (274v1 = GBM 6.861) sādhāraṇā avibhājyāḥ /
XXvinv07_u:4158: yaś ca sannāho yac cānyatra rājopayojyaṃ tat sarvaṃ rājña upanāmayitavyam* /
XXvinv07_u:4159: sthāpayitvāyudhāni taiḥ śastrakaiḥ sūcyaḥ khaṃkharakāś ca kārayitvā saṃghe cārayitavyāḥ /
XXvinv07_u:4160: raṃgāṇāṃ mahāraṃgaḥ kaṃkuṣṭahiṃgulukarājapaṭyādayas te gandhakuṭyāṃ prakṣeptavyāḥ pratimopayogikāḥ
XXvinv07_u:4161: khaṃkhaṭikaṃ gaurikaṃ nīliś ca saṃghena bhājayitvyā /
XXvinv07_u:4165: māṃ bhikṣavaḥ śāstāram uddiśadbhir madyam adeyam apeyam antataḥ kuśāgreṇāpi /
XXvinv07_u:4169: ratnānāṃ muktā varjayitvā maṇivaiḍūryadakṣiṇāvartaparyantāni tu dvau bhāgau kartavyānīti /
XXvinv07_u:4175: pustakānāṃ buddhavacanapustakā avibhajya cāturdiśāya bhikṣusaṃghāya dhāraṇakoṣṭhikāyāṃ prakṣeptavyāḥ
XXvinv07_u:4177: patralekhyaṃ yac chīghraṃ śakyate sādhayituṃ tasya dravyavibhāge tad bhikṣubhir
XXvinv07_u:4179: na śakyate tac cāturdiśāya bhikṣusaṃghāya dhāraṇa /
XXvinv07_u:4181: suvarṇaṃ ca hiraṇyaṃ cānyac ca kṛtākṛtaṃ trayo bhāgāḥ kartavyāḥ /
XXvinv07_u:4185: yo buddhasya tena gandhakuṭyāṃ keśanakhastūpeṣu ca khaṇḍachuṭṭaṃ pratisaṃskartavyam* /
XXvinv07_u:4186: yo dharmasya tena buddhavacanaṃ lekhayitavyaṃ siṃhāsanena vā upayoktavyam* /
XXvinv07_u:4189: yadā rājñā prasenajitā kosalenā toyikāmahaḥ prasthāpitas tadā tatra bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ mahāsannipāto bhavati /
XXvinv07_u:4190: tena khalu samayena mūlaphalguno bhikṣur bhikṣuṇībhāvanīyaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:4218: tena tāsām anurakṣayā stokastokaṃ gṛhītvā pūrvāhṇikā kṛtā /
XXvinv07_u:4219: tataiva velāyāṃ bhuktam akāle pānakaṃ ca pītam* /
XXvinv07_u:4240: ity etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti /
XXvinv07_u:4242: ānandena sthāpitaṃ bhikṣuṇā prativastu mṛtapariṣkārikam adhiṣṭhātavyam* /
XXvinv07_u:4244: śayanāsanaprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā gaṇḍīm ākoṭya pṛṣṭavācikayā bhikṣūn samanuyujya sarvasaṃghe saṃniṣaṇṇe saṃnipatite ekena bhikṣuṇā jñaptiṃ kṛtvā karma kartavyam* /
XXvinv07_u:4247: tasya pātracīvaraṃ sacīvaracīvarikam ānandasya haste tiṣṭhati /
XXvinv07_u:4249: yat saṃgho mūlaphalgunasya bhikṣoḥ pātracīvaraṃ sacīvaracīvarikam ānandena bhikṣuṇā prativastu mṛtapariṣkārikam adhitiṣṭhed ity eṣā jñaptiḥ /
XXvinv07_u:4251: anyatra bhadanta bhikṣuḥ kālaṃ kuryād anyatrāsya pātracīvaram anyatra prativastukaḥ /
XXvinv07_u:4253: yo 'tra upālin prativastuko bhikṣur gṛhī vā /
XXvinv07_u:4255: tena khalu samayena navakarmiko bhikṣuḥ kālagataḥ /
XXvinv07_u:4256: bhikṣavas tasya pātracīvaraṃ kaukṛtyān na bhājayanti /
XXvinv07_u:4265: / tasya pātracīvaraṃ sacīvaracīvarikaṃ trīn bhāgān kartavyam* /
XXvinv07_u:4270: buddhasantakena buddhapūjā vā gandhakūṭyāṃ stūpe vā navakarma kartavyam* /
XXvinv07_u:4273: na cet sambhinnakārī sarvam eva bhikṣubhir bhājayitavyam*
XXvinv07_u:4276: tena khalu samayena saṃbahulā bhikṣavo janapadacārikāṃ caranto 'nupūrveṇa srāvastyām upanagaram anuprāptāḥ* /
XXvinv07_u:4281: śrāvastī tannivāsibhir gopālakaiḥ paśupālakais tṛṇahārakaiḥ kāṣṭhahārakaiḥ pathājīvair utpathājīvaiś ca manuṣyaiḥ samantād ākīrṇā /
XXvinv07_u:4282: te yatra yatra niṣīdanti bhājayāma iti tatra tatra mahājanena parivāryante /
XXvinv07_u:4314: tena khalu samayena bhikṣuṇā bhikṣor haste bhikṣoś cīvarāṇi preṣitāni /
XXvinv07_u:4315: tena bhikṣuṇā yena preṣitāni tasya niśvāsena paribhuktāni /
XXvinv07_u:4318: aviśvāse bhikṣavas tena bhikṣuṇā viśvāsam utpāditam* /
XXvinv07_u:4319: yasya yena bhikṣuṇā preṣitāni tasya tena viśvāsena paribhuktāni /
XXvinv07_u:4320: api tu bhikṣur bhikṣor haste bhikṣoś cīvarakāṇi preṣayati /
XXvinv07_u:4329: yasya preṣitāni tasya kalpena tasya mṛtapariṣkārikam adhitiṣṭhati /
XXvinv07_u:4333: yena preṣitāni tasya kalpena mṛtapariṣkārikam adhitiṣṭhati /
XXvinv07_u:4342: yasya preṣitāni tasya kalpena mṛtapariṣkārikam adhitiṣṭhati /
XXvinv07_u:4344: yena preṣitāni tasya kalpena mṛtapariṣkārikam adhitiṣṭhati /
XXvinv07_u:4350: yena preṣitāni tasya kalpena mṛtapariṣkārikam adhitiṣṭhati /
XXvinv07_u:4355: yasya preṣitāni tasya kalpena mṛtapariṣkāram adhitiṣṭhati /
XXvinv07_u:4357: yena preṣitāni tasya kalpena mṛtapariṣkārikam adhitiṣṭhati /
